about_the_game:
• A Caltrop. Prepare.


Your mother has disappeared, along with dozens of others ― You receive a letter from her, it says to come to this innocent gallery. You hear whispers coming from inside . . .
  • You are the investigator.

• Jump Into the Abyss


« The River takes all, and gives nothing back. Don't fall in, or you'll drown. »

A short, unique experience in which you go into the bowels of a mysterious gallery to find what has been lost . . . and to bring them back. Maybe the eccentric curator will help you?

Set decades after the events of the trials, in which humanity made first-contact with intelligent alien life, the world has been changed forever. Your mother was the translator who talked to them and learned the secrets of the universe. She revealed that a universal war would happen, but nothing seems to have happened yet . . . Maybe it was a bluff? Suddenly, your mother disappears, along with dozens of others. You then receive a letter from days before she disappeared telling you to come to the gallery . . . What could this mean?


• Discover What Lurks in the Waters


« With eyes and ears dried of fear . . . »

  • Features a unique story, with lore! Set in 4 parts, with saving at the beginning of each part! Explore strange hallways and the artworks that lie within.
  • An interesting constructed language! Learn to communicate using it! It is a complex language and you will have minimal help. You must face the challenge alone.
  • Stressful gameplay and surreal atmospheres! An intense journey! You might lose yourself!
  • ~1.5-2.5 hrs of gameplay!




This is the standalone release of Gallerie, which was originally made for the Dread X Collection 5 in 2022. It's been updated and polished and features some very special extra features!

This game was made by a single person. Hope you have fun with this one!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains violence, blood, abuse, gore, and dismemberment.

name: Gallerie

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9500 / AMD Ryzen 3 5300U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 / AMD Radeon RX 5600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 / AMD Ryzen 5 5500
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 7600
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: A psychological horror adventure where you investigate a large art gallery following many disappearances. You'll go on a journey filled with fear and stress to find out what happened to all those who went missing.
